title: Pointers
alt: Every computer, at the unreachable memory address 0x-1, stores a secret. I found it, and it is that all humans arâ€”SEGMENTATION FAULT.
transcript:
[Cueball is playing a video game, with Black Hat standing behind him.]
Cueball: Man, I suck at this game. Can you give me a few pointers?
Black Hat: 0x3A28213A 0x6339392C, 0x7363682E.
Cueball: I hate you.
